title: Studio space/ live-work
posting_body: West of Interstate 90 Downtown two story brick building at grade level (no step), pets allowed, 30' x 33', 12' ceilings, large windows, view of Lake Erie, full bathroom w/shower, kitchen w/small office size dishwasher, refrigerator, central air conditioning / forced air gas heat - (5 year old 90+ equipment), 10' x 10' first floor office, large private secure courtyard/parking area 40'x 60' with attached pet exercise area, two car garage w/ electric door opener available for additional $150.00.
